title: Buy groceries
description: Purchase milk, eggs, bread, and fruits from the supermarket.

title: Finish project report
description: Complete the final draft and send it to the manager.

title: Call the bank
description: Ask about credit card limit increase and latest statement.

title: Clean the house
description: Vacuum floors, clean kitchen, and tidy up living room.

title: Read 20 pages of a book
description: Continue reading the current book to stay on track.

title: Prepare dinner
description: Cook pasta and prepare a fresh salad.

title: Water the plants
description: Water indoor plants and check soil moisture.

title: Update resume
description: Add recent experience and skills to resume.

title: Reply to emails
description: Respond to pending work and personal emails.
